verses.name: Ephesians 4:18
verses.text: Having the understanding darkened, being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them, because of the blindness of their heart:

verses.name: Ephesians 4:19
verses.text: Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness, to work all uncleanness with greediness.

verses.name: Ephesians 4:20
verses.text: But ye have not so learned Christ;

verses.name: Ephesians 4:21
verses.text: If so be that ye have heard him, and have been taught by him, as the truth is in Jesus:

verses.name: Ephesians 4:22
verses.text: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man, which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts;

verses.name: Ephesians 4:23
verses.text: And be renewed in the spirit of your mind;
